transcript_text:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Ji

Executive: Sir maine aapki paid service li hai Vraj consultancy ke naam se.

Customer: Ji bataiyega sir good afternoon.

Executive: Good afternoon.

Executive: Ji sir.

Customer: Wo wo package hai na cancel karwana hai aur refund chahiye.

Executive: Cancel karwana hai ye kab liya tha aapne?

Customer: Ye liya tha ek ek aad week hua.

Executive: Ek bar rukiye main abhi lunch pe aaya tha aap mujhe time de dijiye main aapko check kara ke 3 baje call back kar raha hu sir. Theek hai?

Customer: Okay karwana theek hai sir mere kam ki mere main service provide karta hu mere kam ki isme lead nahi aa rahi hai ye theek hai main pura pura din system par baitha rehta hu.

Executive: Theek hai.

Executive: Main ek bar check karwa leta hu kyuki ho sakta hai man lijiye aisa nahi hai ki problem aa rahi hai to ek bar catalog check karwa leta hu.

Customer: Cancel karna hai sir are nahi kam hi nahi karna aapke sath to wo refund kya karwa dijiye.

Executive: Sir refund ka nahi hota hai tabhi to main keh raha hu ek bar check karwa leta hu aap mujhe time de dijiye.

Customer: Pehli bar lut gaye the na agli bar se dhyan rakhna ek bar to aap lut hi gaye aisa na ek bar to lut hi gaye agli bar se dhyan rakhna mat karwana aapke sath kya kehna chahte ho?

Executive: Sir ji main ek baat aapko bolna chahta hu agar India mart 30 saal se hai market mein sir aur lakho supplier jude hai to aisa nahi hai na ki koi lut raha hai.

Customer: Are product mein jude hote hai product mein jude rehte hai hum service de rahe hai ek service provider bhi bahut sare hai hamare yaha aisa nahi hai hazaro nahi lakho mein hai sir ek bhi inquiry nahi aa rahi hai hum hum any time aapko de sakte hai din mein ek bhi inquiry nahi aa rahi hai aapki din ki inquiry hamari ja rahi hai.

Executive: Sir aap mujhe check karane ka mauka denge please.

Customer: Ha denge.

Executive: Ji kyuki main abhi exactly system pe nahi hu sir main lunch pe aaya hu do se teen hamara lunch hota hai isiliye keh raha tha main 3 baje system pe ja ke call call karo sir ek bar aap samne se call karoge na mujhe ji samne se karunga sir khud se aapke account manager se kam karwa main khud karunga aap uske liye tension free rahiye aapko call karne ki jarurat nahi hai yahi se call back hogi sir.

Customer: Ha.

Executive: Ji please tension free rahiye sir main karwa raha hu aapko check.

Customer: Sir dhandha nahi aa raha hai inquiry nahi aa rahi hai dhandha na to baat chodo inquiry hai to hum click kare na.

Executive: Wo main samajh gaya sir wo ho sakta hai ki catalog aap mujhe time to de dijiye sir main aapke sare doubts clear kar dunga aisa nahi hai ki kuch galat bolunga aapko sir aisa to nahi hai na ki main aapke paise mang raha hu sir paise de dijiye aisa to nahi hai main service ke regarding keh raha hu ki agar man lijiye kuch improvement ki scope rahegi.

Customer: Sir ke sath sach bolo sir paise to paise to ho gaye sir ek saal ke.

Executive: Sir aap mujhe ek baat bataiye aapne jaise aaj complain kiya customer care pe theek hai?

Customer: Ha.

Executive: Aapne account manager se baat kiya tha aapne apne?

Customer: Nahi.

Executive: Sir to pehle ye cheeze karni chahiye thi na aaj tak aapki account manager se baat hui hai kabhi?

Customer: Ha ek aad bar un logo ne samne se call kiya hai aur bol bhi rahe the ki main aapko kal maine bola tha aaj to main free nahi hu kal samjhana to kal usne bola tha kal main aapko samne se call karunga lekin aisa kuch aaya nahi hai abhi tak.

Executive: Koi nahi main check karwa ke kara de raha hu sir aap panic mat kijiye sir aisa nahi hota aapke sare jo problems aa rahi hai wo resolve ho jayenge sir please tension mat lijiye sir.

Customer: Inquiry hai sir inquiry generate nahi hai sir wo nahi usme se aap fake inquiry generate karke doge abhi.

Executive: Kya sir?

Customer: Problem inquiry nahi aa rahi hai uska hai aisa nahi bol raha hu ki kam nahi ho raha hai hum kam nahi kar rahe hai ki inquiry nahi aa rahi hai to aap kya abhi fake inquiry usko generate karoge.

Executive: Sir main kya bataya ki kuch kamiyan hongi categories added nahi hongi main ye to nahi bola ki main aapke liye inquiry generate karke de dunga fake.

Executive: Main aapko panch bar bol chuka hu sir main aapko panch bar kya bola main lunch pe hu samne system nahi hai to main check karke nahi bata sakta sir aap mujhe 3 baje ka time dijiye main check kara ke kara raha hu aapko call us time sari cheeze resolve kara dunga fir aap same cheez bol rahe hain sir abhi main kaise help karu mere samne computer hi nahi hai sir isiliye mujhe ek ghanta ka time de dijiye please.

Customer: Okay okay sir.

Executive: Ji sir thank you sir.
